FuncDef: This command adds or removes a BGP community list to or from routes matching the route policy statement entry.

ParaDef.Info: The specified community list is added to any existing list of communities.
The specified community list is removed from the existing list of communities.

The specified community list replaces any existing community attribute.
name - The community list name. Allowed values are any string up to 64 characters, composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes. Policy parameters must be enclosed by at-signs (@) and may be midstring; for example, "@variable@," "start@variable@end"," @variable@end", or "start@variable@".
